property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: You may substitute one of your Yojimbo Personalities for your Personality in this duel. Reaction: After another player's action destroys one of your Courtier or Shugenja Personalities, choose your performing Yojimbo Personality: Give him three +1 F Revenge tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: THUNDER While this Shugenja is Thunder, he has +1C. Battle: Bow this card: Ranged Attack with strength equal to this Shugenja's Chi.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Choose your performing Magistrate and target a dishonorable Personality: Rehonor him. Gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WEAPON Asa a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, bow its winner. Reaction: After one of your Personalities enters play: Attach this card to him, paying all costs.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Move your performing Scout Personality home: Straighten his unit. Raise or lower the current battlefield's province's strength by your Scout's Force.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI DEATHSEEKER HERO Battle: If Ashiko is face-up in one of your provinces: Bring her into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs, and reducing her Gold cost by 2 if there are more units on the enemy side than on your side.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI PARAGON TACTICIAN EXPERIENCED UNIQUE After the resolution of your Tactical action: Give Kobi +1F. Reaction: After another player's Battle action resolves which destroyed one of your Lion Clan Personalities at the current battlefield: During the next End Phase, if the destroyed Personality is dead, bring him into play, ignoring costs and Honor Requirements.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI PARAGON Battle/Open: Discard a card and target a Bushido Virtue in your discard pile: Take an additional action to play it for one of its Battle, Limited, or Open actions, as appropriate to the current phase. Remove it from the game after its action ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Bow your performing Artisan Personality and target a non-Unique Personality. Create a Personality with the same base Force, Chi, Personal Honor and keywords as the targeted Personality, who permanently copies all his base abilities except those that copy abilities. Remove the created Personality from the game when your next turn begins.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: HEROIC Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Hero and target an enemy card. If it has no attachments, and is bowed or Nonhuman, destroy it. Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN AIR SHUGENJA Open: Target an Air Personality: Straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN EARTH MONK HENSHIN Battle/Open: Target another Personality or a Follower: Give it a Force bonus or penalty equal to Heiwa's Chi.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN AIR SHUGENJA INQUISITOR MAGISTRATE VILLAIN Reaction: After Izuna enters play, target another player's Personality with Personal Honor lower than or equal to Izuna's Chi. She coerces testimony of a family's secret. Dishonor the targeted Personality and permanently give him KOLAT, NINJA, or SHADOWLANDS.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Paragon, bow him unless this is the Attack phase, and target a Personality with lower Force: Bow him. Lose 3 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: ASHIGARU ELITE UNIQUE Battle: Any number of times per turn, bow one of your Farms: Give +1F to each of your Ashigaru Personalities and Followers at the current battlefield.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: ASHIGARU Reaction: After this card enters play from your hand, target your Personality: Create a 0F ASHIGARU Follower and attach it to him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN SAMURAI BITTER LIES KENSAI Battle/Open: Target a Weapon in your hand: Attach it to Ebara, paying all costs. Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN COURTIER RESOURCEFUL Your provinces have +1 strength while another player controls a dishonorable Personality.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN SAMURAI PARAGON YOJIMBO LOYAL Battle/Open: Choose your performing Courtier at any location: Give Suwabe a Force bonus equal to the Courtier's Chi.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: RETAINER Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold. Political Open: If another player's action has caused you an Honor loss this turn, choose your performing Personality: Give him a +1F Revenge token.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Take an additional action to use a Limited or Open Recon ability as a Battle action, which must target the current battlefield's province. If you do, draw a card after the action's resolution.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: BUSHIDO VIRTUE DUTY Battle/Open: Choose two or three of your performing Samurai: Each of them has +1F and the ability, "Battle: Ranged 4 Attack" while in an army with one or more of the others.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After another player's action targets a card in this unit, if you control any Rings: Negate the card's bowing from the action's effect.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SHUGENJA ARTISAN VICIOUS WORKER OF FLESH After Kiuchi enters play: Lose 1 Honor. Open: Choose your performing Personality and your performing Nonhuman or Undead Personality: Set each Personality's Force equal to the higher base Force of the two.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FEAR Battle: Choose your performing Shadowlands Personality and remove a target dead Personality in any discard pile from the game: Give your Personality +3F, or +4F if he is Undead.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Target a Terrain: Destroy it. Tactical Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -6F: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: ARMOR Fear Battle: Target an enemy Follower: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN SAMURAI IRON CRANE SCOUT Battle: Bow Masafuni unless you have Reconnaissance, and target a Personality: Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SAMURAI COMMANDER CONQUEROR After Bukaro enters play: Lose 1 Honor. Limited: Pay 2 Gold and target a Personality: Create a 1F Follower and attach it to the Personality.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SAMURAI CONQUEROR PARAGON UNDEAD DARK FIST OF IRON After Miki enters play: Lose 1 Honor. After your Events Phase: You may remove a Dark Virtue in your hand or discard pile from the game. If you did not remove one, destroy Miki.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SHUGENJA ARTISAN BLOODSPEAKER KHADI EXPERIENCED 3 LOYAL UNIQUE After Yajinden enters play: Lose 4 Honor. Limited: Target a dead Personality: Yajinden raises him from the dead. Bring him into play (under your control) ignoring costs and Honor Requirements. Remove him from the game when the turn ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MAHO This Shugenja has +2F and SHADOWLANDS. Battle: Remove a target dead Personality in any player's discard pile from the game: Create a 2F/2C/0PH SHADOWLANDS UNDEAD Personality at the current battlefield. Remove him from the game after this battle;s resolution. Lose 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: HEROIC Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Hero: Give him +2F for each Personality you control not at the current battlefield.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KATA POLITICAL You have the ability, "Political Reaction: Before you gain Honor during your turn, bow your performing Courtier: Negate the gain. Choose a player. He loses 2 Honor." Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Katas.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Reaction: After engaging, bow your performing Magistrate and target an enemy dishonorable Personality at the current battlefield: Move him home. If he moved, bow his unit, and his controller loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, pay Gold equal to a target Personality or unit's total Gold cost minus 4: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Move him home. Destroy him if he has no attachments. Gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Bow your performing Scout and target an enemy card: Bow it. The enemy leader discards a card of his choice, or a random card if you have Reconnaissance.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN SAMURAI DUELIST MAGISTRATE Battle: Target a Personality with lower Personal Honor than Shigeyuki's Chi: Shigeyuki challenges him. He may refuse; if he does, move him home. Both Personalities use their Personal Honor as their duel stat. Bow the duel's loser's unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EARTH While this Shugenja is Earth, your provinces have +1 strength. Battle/Open: Bow this Shugenja, destroy this card, and target a bowed Personality: Negate his next straightening this game.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FORTUNE UNIQUE Your provinces have +2 strength. Limited: Destroy your rightmost provinces and discard this card: Gain 4 Honor; this gain will not be negated.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FIRE While this Shugenja is Fire, he has +1F. Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy attachment. Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN NONHUMAN SHOJO PROPHET As an additional cost of En'you entering play, either remove a card in your hand from the game or destroy one of your Sake tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WATER While this Shugenja is Water, other players' province have -1 strength. Reaction: After the resolution of an action that moved a Personality to the current battlefield: Give him -4F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Limited: Bow your performing Courtier; Choose a player. He gains or loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FEAR IAIJUTSU Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Duelist and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi; Move him home. If he moved, choose a player, who gains or loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Choose your performing Samurai and target another player's Personality or Follower: Negate the effects of the next action performed by the targeted card (this turn). Bow it if it has no attachments and is not a Samurai.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: Before an Event resolves: Negate its effects. Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Move him home. Straighten his unit if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: If your current army has more units than the current enemy army, bow your two performing Nonhumans and target an enemy unit: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SIEGE Battle/Open: Bow this card and target a province: Give it +3 or -3 strength. Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 3 Attack with +1 strength for each Follower in this unit.

property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS NINJA May not be included in decks.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS NINJA IMMORTAL After Sawaki enters play: Lose 2 Honor. Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets Sawaki, destroy him: Create two 1F/1C/0PH SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS NINJA Personalities at the current battlefield.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Berserker, bow him unless he was not in play when this Combat Segment began, and target an enemy card without attachments and with equal or lower Force: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After the resolution of your action that bowed, destroyed, or moved a Personality who has opposed this card at the current battlefield: Gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SAMURAI COMMANDER BLESSED OF THE FORTUNE OF PERSISTENCE Reaction: Before the resolution of another player's action, if Fujita is at the current battlefield: Negate the destruction of your Followers from its effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SHADOWLANDS BERSERKER DAMNED Reaction: After Yamadera enters play from a province: Refill if face-up. Battle: Target an enemy card with lower Force: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SAMURAI CHUI COMMANDER SCOUT EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Your Followers at Akio's location have +1F while you have Reconnaissance. Battle: Bow your performing Personality or Follower: Ranged 5 Attack.

property.value: CAVALRY Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WEAPON UNIQUE You must declare an attack each turn and assign this Personality to attack if possible. Reaction: After an action targets this Personality: Negate this Personality's movement from the action's effects.

property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI TACTICIAN Reaction: Even if Ayumu is bowed, after you announce a Tactical action, if he is at the current battlefield: Straighten him.

property.name: Text Box

property.value: Reaction: After another player targets your Paragon with a Battle action performed by a Personality with lower Personal Honor: The action's costs are ignored and its effects are negated. That player may take an additional Battle action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN FIRE SHUGENJA YOJIMBO Reaction: After a Ranged Attack is targeted: Give the Ranged Attack +2 strength. Battle: Any number of times per turn: Ranged 1 Attack.

property.value: DRAGON CLAN SAMURAI DUELIST EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Follower or Personality without attachments: Destroy it. Remove it from the game if it is a Lion Clan Personality.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: If you control a Personality, target a Personality and pay Gold equal to the number of Personalities you control, or 4, whichever is higher: The targeted Personality may not assign to battlefields.

property.value: UNIQUE Until your Events Phase three turns from now begins, you may target Followers in your discard pile with the Equip rulebook action.

property.value: POLITICAL Reaction: After an attacking player announces a Battle action before the Defender's first normal opportunity to act or pass: Negate its effects. Open: Choose your performing dishonorable Personality: Rehonor him. After the next time (this turn) you lose Honor from another player's card effect, give him three +1F Revenge tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: If the enemy leader has taken any Battle actions during this battle: You may take two additional Battle actions after this one. You will not take any other additional Battle actions this battle.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Kensai: Straighten his unit if he has a Weapon. You may attach a Weapon to him from your discard pile, paying all costs and paying 2 less Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Bow your performing Personality and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if it is an attachment or its base Gold Cost is 0. Before this battle's resolution, straighten your Personality.

property.value: Attaches to a Courtier paying 2 less Gold. Political Limited: Remove this card from the game and target a dishonorably dead Personality: His owner loses Honor equal to the Personality's base Personal Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TERRAIN Before this battle's resolution: You may bow one or two attacking Personalities at the current battlefield. Battle: If there are no Terrains at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FARM MARKET PORT Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold. Reaction: When paying a Gold Cost: Produce 1 Gold. (This can be used together with bowing this card to produce Gold.)

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID You may attach this card from your discard pile to your Void Shugenja. Open: Bow this card and target another player's Personality: You find out his dark secret. Give him Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, the loser's controller draws a card. Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Rehonor him. If he is opposed, straighten him. You may move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Your dishonorable Paragons do not have a maximum Personal Honor of 0 from the rulebook. Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target a Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Move him home. Gain 2 Honor if you do not control him.

If this discarded a Personality, you have the first opportunity to take a Battle action in this battle, which must be performed by Toson.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN NINJA ASSASSIN Battle: Target an enemy card: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KIHO Battle: Choose your performing Monk: Negate all current Force penalties on him from actions. If he has a Weapon, negate the next card effect that moves him home or bows him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Limited: Choose your performing Ninja Personality and target a non-Unique Personality: Your Ninja permanently copies the Personality's base keywords, except Clan Champion, Daimyo, or Shugenja, and permanently copies his base abilities which do not themselves copy abilities.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN COURTIER JUNSHIN MAGISTRATE IRON FLOWER Political Battle: Target a Personality with Personal Honor lower than or equal to Komiko's Chi: Bow the Personality. If he is dishonorable, his controller loses 2 Honor.

property.value: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Kensai, permanently give him the ability, 'Battle: Bow one of this Personality's Weapons and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.' Otherwise, permanently give him Kensai.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Ninja, permanently give him the ability, 'Ninja Battle: Target two Personalities controlled by the same player at different locations: Switch their locations.' Otherwise, permanently give him Ninja.

property.name: Text Box

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TEMPLE Open: Even if this card is bowed, target another player's Personality: Give him -4F, which will not be negated. If he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, you control an Inquisitor, and it is not your turn, choose a player, who gains or loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TERRAIN After the first time, while this card remains in play, that a player passes instead of announcing a Battle action: He chooses and destroys one of his Personalities at the current battlefield. Battle: If there are no Terrains at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Limited: Choose your performing Courtier and target another player's dishonorable Personality: He is asked to make a sacrifice. The player may show you his hand. If he does, you may discard a card from it. If he does not choose this, his Personality will not be affected by the rulebook seppuku action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NONHUMAN BASHE Battle: Target one or two attachments, or a Personality without attachments, with a total Force lower than The Red Hunger's Force: He swallows them whole. Destroy the targeted cards.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Battle: Move your performing Ninja Personality home and target an enemy card: Bow it. Negate its next straightening (this turn).

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Battle Maiden and target an enemy Personality: Move your Battle Maiden to the current battlefield. Straighten her if she moved. Give the enemy Personality -3F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Tactician, permanently give him the ability, 'Tactical Battle: Bow this Personality: Draw a card.' Otherwise, permanently give him Tactician.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID While this Shugenja is Void, your maximum hand size is increased by 1. Limited: Bow this card: Look at the top card of any Fate deck. You may destroy this card; if you do, discard the card you looked at.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID KIHO Open: Bow your performing Monk unless he is Void: He meditates. Put a Kiho Strategy in your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: AIR KIHO Open: Choose your performing unbowed Monk: Give him Cavalry. If you control any Rings or he is Air, give him +4F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN FIRE MONK TATTOOED DRUNKEN MASTER Limited: Give Sakata a +1F Fire or Sake token. Battle: Sakata breathes fire. Ranged 4 Attack, with +1 strength for each Sake token on Sakata.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: You may choose and destroy a Region. Until your next turn begins, negate all movement to and from battlefields.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WEAPON May not be included in decks.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA WEAPON Will only attach to a Ninja. Battle: Choose your performing Ninja, and destroy this card or discard it from your hand: Ranged 3 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WATER TATTOO Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Personality and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. This movement will not be negated if your Personality is Water. If the enemy Personality moved, bow his unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI SCOUT Enters play paying 2 less Gold if you are a Lion Clan or Scorpion Clan player. Battle: Bow Yashiro unless you have Reconnaissance: Ranged 4 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy card: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI BATTLE MAIDEN CAVALRY PARAGON Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Personal Honor: Bow him. Gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI TACTICIAN EXPERIENCED UNIQUE ADVISOR TO THE AMETHYST CHAMPION Reaction: After a Personality assigns or moves, if he is now opposing Tairu: Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CAVALRY After this card bows: Straighten it. Reaction: After another player's action targets a card in this unit: Negate this card's destruction from the action's effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: THUNDER FEAR Battle: Choose your performing opposed unbowed Thunder Personality: Raise his Force to 6. You may target and bow an enemy card with lower Force and no attachments.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: AIR After this card enters play, if this Shugenja is Air: Choose a player, who gains or loses 1 Honor. Open: Bow this Shugenja and target another player's Personality: After the next time (this turn) he assigns to attack you, gain 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if you control a Temple.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN NONHUMAN GORYO CAVALRY SPIRIT Battle: Target a card without attachments in a unit led by a dishonorable Personality: Destroy the targeted card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN NONHUMAN ZOKUJIN MOUNTAINEER Xijkt may assign during Cavalry Maneuvers if you are the Defender. Battle: Bow Xijkt or one of your Mines, and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN COURTIER KOLAT MERCHANT Reaction: When paying for a Holding, bow Dokansuto: Produce 2 Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN COURTIER SEDUCTRESS EXPERIENCED LOYAL UNIQUE Sachina's base ability will not be copied. Political Limited: Once per game, target a Personality, pay Gold equal to his unit's total Gold Cost plus four, and bow Sachina: Take control of him. After the next time this game Sachina leaves play, give control of him to his owner.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN COURTIER SAMURAI AMBASSADOR MAGISTRATE NAVAL EXPERIENCED 2 LOYAL UNIQUE Reaction: When paying an action's Gold cost: Produce 3 Gold. Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments and pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI EXTORTIONIST MAGISTRATE NAVAL Open: Pay 2 Gold: Choose a player. He targets one of his unbowed Personalities or Holdings or a card in his hand. If the targeted card is in his hand, discard it. Otherwise, bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI COMMANDER NAVAL Battle: Target an attachment: Put it in its owner's hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TEMPLE SINGULAR Open: If it is not your turn, choose your two unbowed performing Personalities with Clan alignments that do not share a Clan alignment, and bow one of them: Gain 1 Honor. Give your provinces +2 strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: ASHIGARU May not be included in decks.
